sentences.english: The qianrou refers to the point of flowers night in Yunmeng.
sentences.chinese: 纖柔之指，點開了花宵的雲夢。

sentences.english: It holds so much meaning in an elegant slender cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一個纖柔的柱體，承載着太多的意義。

sentences.english: Cold, delicately as the dark snow.
sentences.chinese: 冰冷，纖柔如黑色的霜雪。
